items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Designer dress at a great price!
items.body: Great fit - true to size. It is a tight fitting dress so you need to be comfortable with that. The quality of the material was nice, it would be a bit heavy for summer, but I wore it to an outdoor Fall wedding and it was perfect. Received many compliments. Read more
items.author: Jill Heitmeyer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it but snug
items.body: Loved this dress. Pretty pattern and color. Unfortunately it was a little too snug in the hip area so had to return. Read more
items.author: Kathleen Canney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and comfortable
items.body: Beautiful dress and style is as expected! Very comfortable and flattering fit Read more
items.author: Mary McGuire

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice
items.body: Cute dress but couldn’t keep shoulder in an attractive position. Maybe a lil too loose. Very stretchy Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Love this dress. The material is amazing. I am 9 months pregnant and it still fits my body. Im 5'2 and got a size small. Material does stretch with your body which is wonderful. And I can wear it when im not longer pregnant. Read more
items.author: Reece Stokes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to Size
items.body: Super comfortable and true to size yet still stretchy! Read more
items.author: Kylie Dillon

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wanted to love it but neckline looked cheap
items.body: I really wanted to love this dress! The green color is gorgeous in person and the fabric is actually very stretchy, comfy and lightweight. My issue was the off the shoulder neckline. The elastic and stitching along the top look basic and a little puckered, so the neckline does not sit smoothly. It bunches in spots and gives more of a casual vibe instead of the clean, polished look you want for a formal dress. Especially for the price, I expected the neckline to be finished better. Since that area is front and center, it made the whole dress feel cheaper than it looked online so I’ll be returning it even though the rest of it had a lot of potential. Read more
items.author: Kenzie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars THIS DRESS IS AMAZING!
items.body: I want this dress in EVERY color. It is extremely flattering, the length is great and I received endless compliments! I wore with spanx underneath for a smoother look and went true to size! Read more
items.author: everydaywith_jamie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Long Sleeve Bodycon Cocktail Off Shoulder Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Long Sleeve Bodycon Cocktail Off Shoulder Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Winered, Brown, Khaki, Pink, White, Purple, Black, Dustyblue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
